sentences.sContent: He grew in stature (= became more admired or popular ) during the campaign.
sentences.sCn: 在这场宣传活动中，他的声望提高了。

synos.tran: 身高，[人类]身材；（精神、道德等的）高度

remMethod.val: stat(站立) + ure(表状态、 名词后缀) → 站的状态 → 身材， 身高

trans.tranCn: 身材， 身高； 地位， 声望， 名望
trans.tranOther: the degree to which someone is admired or regarded as important
